title: Wan Sheng Jie
overview: The pure and cute little devil Nini lives in Room 1031 of Wan Sheng Street Apartment. His roommates are no ordinary people: The lazy and wacky vampire Ira who spends most of his time gaming or watching TV, the unlucky dancer werewolf Vladimir, the serious and old-fashioned angel landlord Lynn and his naive little sister Lily, and many more.What none of them realize is that the power of the demon king is sleeping inside of Nini. With evil forces in hot pursuit, can Nini and his friends head off disaster?
